pages.text: $(li)The Cactus Paste is an item that you can use to craft $(l)Green Dye$() and $(l)Midori Blocks$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can obtain this item smelting $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cactus)Cactus$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l).
